trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> and also for limited types of writing to the document.
trans-unit.target: Definisce i metodi per la lettura delle parti di un <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> e anche per tipi limitati di scrittura del documento.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The definition that is added.
trans-unit.target: La definizione che viene aggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Flushes the package <xref:System.IO.Stream> and also commits an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> to the package.
trans-unit.target: Scarica il pacchetto <xref:System.IO.Stream>e inoltre esegue il commit un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> al pacchetto.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based position of the document in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione in base zero del documento di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the document location in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Int32>che rappresenta il percorso del documento nella sequenza.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""></xref> part, if one exists, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""> </xref> parte, se presente, del <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document does not need to have a Document Structure part.
trans-unit.target: Un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento non è necessario disporre di una struttura del documento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""></xref> element, if one exists, and its child elements.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"> </xref> che rappresenta il <xref uid="langword_csharp_DocumentStructure" name="DocumentStructure" href=""> </xref> elemento, se presente e gli elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> readers, one reader for each page in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> lettori, un lettore per ogni pagina di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of fixed page readers, one reader for each page in the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un insieme di pagina fisse lettori, un lettore per ogni pagina di <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reader for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un lettore per il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> con l'oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the page.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della pagina.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader"></xref> for the page.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader"> </xref> per la pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, if one exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>, se presente, che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>fa parte di un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] del documento, vedere il capitolo 2 nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that contains the default printing options for the document; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no print ticket exists for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> che contiene le opzioni di stampa predefinite per il documento; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se non esiste nessun ticket di stampato per il documento.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> dal <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The definition that is removed.
trans-unit.target: La definizione che è stato rimosso.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the signature definitions that are associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutte le definizioni di firma associati il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of signature definitions, typically one for every person who signed or will sign the document.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> definizioni della firma, in genere uno per ogni persona che ha firmato o firmerà il documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'immagine di anteprima, se esiste un'immagine di anteprima, che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the image.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"> </xref> che rappresenta l'immagine.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the document.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per il documento.</xref:System.Uri>
